file_content.text: Please tell me Lord Zash sent you. Please. I can't stand it here any longer. I don't want to die!
Ha. Sniveling creature. Not even worth devouring.
Are you Grathan's cyborg expert in chains?
You the scientist?
Yes, yes, I am and I got just what you need--just what Lord Zash ordered.
I'm a friend. Lord Zash sent me.
Calm down.
Oh thank goodness. I got just what you need, then. You can tell Lord Zash that Dorotsech did good work.
I understand you've created a device that can harm cyborgs. Give it to me.
I want your invention.
The device? Oh, you mean the neutralizer, the cyber neutralizer.
My finest work yet--though I don't quite see what the use of it is.
If you hope to trick me into revealing something, your hopes are poorly placed indeed.
Nice try.
No! I don't want to know any more than is good for me. I'm just warning you.
What?
The neutralizer works by hijacking the cyber neural center, causing it to fire impulses so rapidly it overloads.
Real cutting-edge tech, and real expensive to develop. It'll work like a charm on a droid, but it's a one-off and too expensive for mass production.
I only need to use it once.
That's okay.
If you're sure of that.
I don't care how it works, just give me the device.
Hand it over already.
Look, I really don't want to be the one telling you this, but it's not that simple.
What of the mechanical Darth?
And Skotia?
I don't know who you're talking about, and I don't want to know.
Why, to fell a Darth, my anxious friend.
To kill Skotia.
But that's just what I'm saying--I don't know how useful it actually is.
Lord Zash commissioned this weapon against cyborgs--thing is, most cyborgs are only ten percent machine.
You'd need someone at least fifty percent machine for the neutralizer to do any real damage.
Oh, my mark's fifty percent machine--at least.
Perfect.
I don't want to know! I don't want to know!
The heads-up is appreciated.
Tell me where it is, or I'll kill you.
Give it to me!
If you want it, take it. It's only a prototype, but I guess it'll work if there's one droid you really want to bash.
It's in the lab building, can't be missed. But Grathan wouldn't let me at the power cells I needed to power it. You'll need to steal those off his droids.
I'm supposed to keep you quiet, and I think you know what that means.
Time to shut you up.
No, please! Zash said she'd free me. I have a wife and children and an astromech droid... I have to live!
Please. Look, I'm an inventor, right? A damn good inventor. You let me live, I'll invent you something. Whatever you want.
Like something to protect me from my enemies?
I could use defense.
I want to be able to kill Jedi by the hundreds!
An offensive weapon?
I know just the thing! I'll get started on it right away, okay? I'll send it to you, yes?
And as for your plans, no one'll hear a word about it from me. Not one word. Thank you! Thank you!
You have been most helpful.
No, thank you.
Just don't renege.
This won't be the last time a pathetic wretch bows to me.
I love it when you grovel.
Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you.
Don't say a word about this to anyone.
Keep your lips sealed.
Goodbye. [Kill him]
No! Please! Lord Zash said she'd free me!
No! Please! Don't hurt me!
